info.name: 6steps-glow
info.description:
The resource API endpoints provide a way for CRUD operations (Create, Read, Update, Delete) on a resource.

Here's a brief overview of the admins endpoints and their corresponding HTTP methods Example:

| HTTP Method | URI Pattern | Action | Description |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| GET | `/admins` | index | Display a listing of the resource. |
| GET | `/admins/create` | create | Show the form for creating a new resource. |
| POST | `/admins` | store | Store a newly created resource in storage. |
| GET | `/admins/{id}` | show | Display the specified resource. |
| GET | `/admins/{id}/edit` | edit | Show the form for editing the specified resource. |
| PUT | `/admins/{id}` | update | Update the specified resource in storage. |
| DELETE | `/admins/{id}` | destroy | Remove the specified resource from storage. |
| PUT | /`admins`/{id}/toggleActive/1 | toggle Active | Activate the specified resource from storage. |
| PUT | /`admins`/{id}/toggleActive/0 | toggle InActive | deactivate the specified resource from storage. |

request.description:
The HTTP PUT request to update the brand information at `{{brand}}brands/1` requires a JSON payload in the raw request body. The payload should include the following fields:

- `brand_name` (string): The name of the brand.
    
- `logo` (string): URL of the brand's logo.
    
- `website_url` (string): URL of the brand's website.
    
- `description` (string): Description of the brand.
    
- `address` (string): Address of the brand.
    
- `branches_no` (integer): Number of branches of the brand.
    
- `tax_no` (string): Tax number of the brand.
    
- `cr_no` (string): CR number of the brand.
    
- `cat_names` (array of strings): Array of category names associated with the brand.
    

### Request Body Parameters

| **Field** | **Type** | **Validation Rules** | **Description** |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| `brand_name` | String | required, min:3, max:60, unique:brands,brand_name | The name of the brand (must be unique). |
| `email` | String | required, email, min:7, max:50, unique:brands,email | The email address (must be unique and valid). |
| `logo` | String | required, min:5, max:190 | The logo URL or file path. |
| `website_url` | String | nullable, url, min:5, max:190 | The website URL (optional, must be valid). |
| `description` | String | required, min:5, max:200 | A description of the brand. |
| `address` | String | required, min:5, max:190 | The physical address of the brand. |
| `branches_no` | Integer | required, numeric, min:0, max:2000 | The number of branches (must be a number). |
| `tax_no` | String | nullable, min:15, max:15 | The tax number (optional, exact 15 characters). |
| `cr_no` | String | nullable, min:10, max:10 | The commercial registration number (optional, exact 10 characters). |
| `cat_names` | Array | required, array | Array of category names to which the brand belongs. |
| `cat_names.\*` | String | required, exists:cats,cat_name | Each category name must exist in the `cats` table. |

The response of this request is documented as a JSON schema.

| `start_at` | \`required | date_format:Y-m-d\\TH:i:s.u\\Z | after:current_time\` |

| `video_seconds_min` | \`required | numeric | min:1 |
| `video_seconds_max` | \`required | numeric | min:1 |
| `video_price` | \`required | min:1 | max:10000\` |

| `city_names` | \`required | array\` | `["New York", "Los Angeles"]` |
| `city_names.\*` | \`required | exists:cities,city_name\` | `New York` |

request.description:
### Request Body Parameters

| Field | Description | Example Value |
| --- | --- | --- |
| creator_name | Creator's name (required) | "John Doe" |
| mobile | Mobile number (required, Saudi Arabia format) | "966501234567" |
| logo | required) | "logo.png" |
| bio | Biography (required) | "Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet" |
| address | Address (required) | "123 Main Street, City, Country" |
| birth_date | Birth date (required, after 1925-07-11, before 10 years ago) | "1990-05-20" |
| IBAN_no | IBAN number (optional, format: SA followed by 22 digits) | "SA1234567890123456789012" |
| Mawthooq_no | Mawthooq number (optional, min: 5, max: 20 characters) | "ABC123" |
| cat_names | Array of category names (required) | \["Category1", "Category2"\] |
| cat_names.\* | Each category name in the array (required, must exist in 'cats' table) | "Category1" |

### Request Body Parameters

| Field | Description | Example Value |
| --- | --- | --- |
| sampleVideos | Array of sample videos (required) | \[{"video_url": "[video.mp4"](https://video.mp4), "video_order_no": 1, "video_image_path": "[image.png"](https://image.png), "video_description": "Sample video description"}\] |
| sampleVideos.\*.video_url | (required, min: 3, max: 190 characters) | "video.mp4" |
| sampleVideos.\*.video_order_no | Order number of the video (required, numeric, min: 0, max: 10000) | 1 |
| sampleVideos.\*.video_image_path | Image path of the video (required, min: 10, max: 190 characters) | "[image.png"](https://image.png) |
| sampleVideos.\*.video_description | Description of the video (optional, min: 10, max: 200 characters) | "This is a sample video description" |

### Request Body Parameters

| Field Name | Type | Constraints | Example |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| explanation | string | required, min:5, max:500, | "This request explanation of campaign 1" |
| campaign_id | string | required, exists:campaigns,campaign_id | 1 |

| Field Name | Type | Constraints | Example |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| explanation | string | required, min:5, max:500, | "This request explanation of campaign 1" |

### API Validation Rules  

| Field Name             | Validation Rules                                   | Example Value                  | Description                                                    |
|------------------------|---------------------------------------------------|--------------------------------|----------------------------------------------------------------|
| `request_id`           | `required|exists:campaign_requests,request_id`   | `123`                          | Required. Must exist in the `campaign_requests` table.        |
| `video_url`            | `required|url|min:5|max:191`                      | `https://example.com/video`   | Required. Must be a valid URL, min 5 and max 191 characters.  |
| `video_image_path`     | `required|min:5|max:191`                          | `path/to/image.jpg`           | Required. Min 5 and max 191 characters.                        |
| `video_description`    | `required|min:5|max:500`                          | `This is a video description.` | Required. Min 5 and max 500 characters.                        |

### API Validation Rules  

| Field Name             | Validation Rules                                   | Example Value                  | Description                                                    |
|------------------------|---------------------------------------------------|--------------------------------|----------------------------------------------------------------|
| `request_id`           | `required|exists:campaign_requests,request_id`   | `123`                          | Required. Must exist in the `campaign_requests` table.        |
| `video_url`            | `required|url|min:5|max:191`                      | `https://example.com/video`   | Required. Must be a valid URL, min 5 and max 191 characters.  |
| `video_image_path`     | `required|min:5|max:191`                          | `path/to/image.jpg`           | Required. Min 5 and max 191 characters.                        |
| `video_description`    | `required|min:5|max:500`                          | `This is a video description.` | Required. Min 5 and max 500 characters.                        |

### Request Body Parameters

| Field Name | Type   | Constraints  | Example     |
|------------|--------|--------------|-------------|
| mobile     | string | required, sa_mobile | "966501234567"

### Query Parameters

| Field Name | Type | Constraints | Example |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| paginationCounter | numeric | nullable, min:1, max:1000 | 10 |
| page | numeric | nullable, min:1, max:1000 | 2 |
| sortDirection | string | nullable, in:ASC,DESC | "ASC" |
| dateFrom | string | nullable, date_format:Y-m-d H:i:s | "2024-01-01 12:00:00" |
| dateTo | string | nullable, date_format:Y-m-d H:i:s | "2024-06-30 23:59:59" |
| sortColumn | string | nullable, in:cat_name,cat_id | "cat_name" |

### Request Body Parameters

| Field Name | Type | Constraints | Example |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| cat_name | string | required, min:3, max:50, unique:cats,cat_name | "Fluffy" |

request.description:
This endpoint makes an HTTP GET request to retrieve a list of admins. The request includes the following parameters in the raw request body:

- paginationCounter (integer): The pagination counter for the list
    
- page (integer): The page number
    
- sortColumn (string): The column to sort the list by
    
- sortDirection (string): The direction for sorting
    
- dateFrom (string): Start date for filtering
    
- dateTo (string): End date for filtering
    
- admin_id (null): Filter by admin ID
    
- admin_name (null): Filter by admin name
    
- email (null): Filter by email
    
- mobile (null): Filter by mobile number
    
- logo (null): Filter by logo
    
- address (null): Filter by address
    
- websit_url (null): Filter by website URL
    
- email_verified_at (null): Filter by email verification date
    
- password (null): Filter by password
    
- deleted_at (null): Filter by deletion date
    
- created_at (null): Filter by creation date
    
- updated_at (null): Filter by update date

request.description:
### Request Body Parameters

| Field | Type | Validation Rules | Example Value | Description |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| `admin_name` | String | required, min:5, max:50, unique | `AdminJohn` | The name of the admin, must be unique. |
| `email` | String | required, min:5, max:60, unique | `admin@example.com` | The email address of the admin, must be unique and valid. |
| `mobile` | String | required, sa_mobile, unique | `+1234567890` | The mobile number of the admin, must be in a specific format and unique. |
| `logo` | String | nullable, min:5, max:190 | `https://example.com/logo.png` | The URL for the admin logo (optional). |
| `address` | String | nullable, min:5, max:190 | `123 Admin St, Admin City` | The address of the admin (optional). |
| `website_url` | String | nullable, url, min:5, max:190 | `https://example.com` | The website URL of the admin (optional). |
| `password` | String | required, min:8, max:12 | `SecurePass1!` | The password for the admin account. |

### Description of Fields:

- **admin_name**: Must be unique among all admins and has length constraints.
    
- **email**: Needs to be a valid email format and unique across administrators.
    
- **mobile**: Should follow specific mobile number formatting and be unique.
    
- **logo**: An optional field where you can provide a URL for the logo image.
    
- **address**: An optional address for the admin.
    
- **website_url**: An optional field for the admin's website, must be in URL format if provided.
    
- **password**: A required field that should be secure and follow length constraints.

### Request Body Parameters

| Field | Type | Validation Rules | Example Value | Description |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| `admin_name` | String | required, min:5, max:50, unique | `AdminJohn` | The name of the admin, must be unique. |
| `email` | String | required, min:5, max:60, unique | `admin@example.com` | The email address of the admin, must be unique and valid. |
| `mobile` | String | required, sa_mobile, unique | `+1234567890` | The mobile number of the admin, must be in a specific format and unique. |
| `logo` | String | nullable, min:5, max:190 | `https://example.com/logo.png` | The URL for the admin logo (optional). |
| `address` | String | nullable, min:5, max:190 | `123 Admin St, Admin City` | The address of the admin (optional). |
| `website_url` | String | nullable, url, min:5, max:190 | `https://example.com` | The website URL of the admin (optional). |


### Description of Fields:

- **admin_name**: Must be unique among all admins and has length constraints.
    
- **email**: Needs to be a valid email format and unique across administrators.
    
- **mobile**: Should follow specific mobile number formatting and be unique.
    
- **logo**: An optional field where you can provide a URL for the logo image.
    
- **address**: An optional address for the admin.
    
- **website_url**: An optional field for the admin's website, must be in URL format if provided.

request.description:
The HTTP PUT request to update the brand information at `{{brand}}brands/1` requires a JSON payload in the raw request body. The payload should include the following fields:

- `brand_name` (string): The name of the brand.
    
- `logo` (string): URL of the brand's logo.
    
- `website_url` (string): URL of the brand's website.
    
- `description` (string): Description of the brand.
    
- `address` (string): Address of the brand.
    
- `branches_no` (integer): Number of branches of the brand.
    
- `tax_no` (string): Tax number of the brand.
    
- `cr_no` (string): CR number of the brand.
    
- `cat_names` (array of strings): Array of category names associated with the brand.
    

### Request Body Parameters

| **Field** | **Type** | **Validation Rules** | **Description** |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| `brand_name` | String | required, min:3, max:60, unique:brands,brand_name | The name of the brand (must be unique). |
| `email` | String | required, email, min:7, max:50, unique:brands,email | The email address (must be unique and valid). |
| `logo` | String | required, min:5, max:190 | The logo URL or file path. |
| `website_url` | String | nullable, url, min:5, max:190 | The website URL (optional, must be valid). |
| `description` | String | required, min:5, max:200 | A description of the brand. |
| `address` | String | required, min:5, max:190 | The physical address of the brand. |
| `branches_no` | Integer | required, numeric, min:0, max:2000 | The number of branches (must be a number). |
| `tax_no` | String | nullable, min:15, max:15 | The tax number (optional, exact 15 characters). |
| `cr_no` | String | nullable, min:10, max:10 | The commercial registration number (optional, exact 10 characters). |
| `cat_names` | Array | required, array | Array of category names to which the brand belongs. |
| `cat_names.\*` | String | required, exists:cats,cat_name | Each category name must exist in the `cats` table. |

The response of this request is documented as a JSON schema.
The HTTP DELETE request is used to delete a specific brand with the ID of 1 in the admin system.
This endpoint sends an HTTP PUT request to toggle the active status of a brand with the ID 2.

request.description:
### GET /creators

This endpoint retrieves a list of creators.

#### Request Parameters
- `paginationCounter` (integer): The pagination counter.
- `page` (integer): The page number.
- `sortColumn` (string): The column to sort by.
- `sortDirection` (string): The direction of sorting.
- `dateFrom` (string): The start date for filtering.
- `dateTo` (string): The end date for filtering.
- `creator_id` (null): The ID of the creator.
- `mobile` (null): The mobile number of the creator.
- `email` (null): The email of the creator.
- `email_verified_at` (null): The date and time when the email was verified.
- `creator_name` (null): The name of the creator.
- `logo` (null): The logo of the creator.
- `bio` (null): The biography of the creator.
- `address` (null): The address of the creator.
- `IBAN_no` (null): The IBAN number of the creator.
- `Mawthooq_no` (null): The Mawthooq number of the creator.
- `brith_date` (null): The birth date of the creator.
- `deleted_at` (null): The date and time when the creator was deleted.
- `created_at` (null): The date and time when the creator was created.
- `updated_at` (null): The date and time when the creator was last updated.

#### Response (JSON schema)
The response schema for this request is not provided.

### Request Body Parameters

| Field | Description | Example Value |
| --- | --- | --- |
| creator_name | Creator's name (required) | "John Doe" |
| mobile | Mobile number (required, Saudi Arabia format) | "966501234567" |
| logo | required) | "logo.png" |
| bio | Biography (required) | "Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet" |
| address | Address (required) | "123 Main Street, City, Country" |
| birth_date | Birth date (required, after 1925-07-11, before 10 years ago) | "1990-05-20" |
| IBAN_no | IBAN number (optional, format: SA followed by 22 digits) | "SA1234567890123456789012" |
| Mawthooq_no | Mawthooq number (optional, min: 5, max: 20 characters) | "ABC123" |
| cat_names | Array of category names (required) | \["Category1", "Category2"\] |
| cat_names.\* | Each category name in the array (required, must exist in 'cats' table) | "Category1" |

### Request Body Parameters

| Field | Description | Example Value |
| --- | --- | --- |
| creator_name | Creator's name (required) | "John Doe" |
| mobile | Mobile number (required, Saudi Arabia format) | "966501234567" |
| logo | required) | "logo.png" |

| address | Address (required) | "123 Main Street, City, Country" |
